00001 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------
00002  * kb_init.c - KoreBot Library -  Initialization
00003  *--------------------------------------------------------------------
00004  * $Id: kb_init.c,v 1.2 2004/09/22 08:29:14 pbureau Exp $
00005  *--------------------------------------------------------------------
00006  * $Author: pbureau $
00007  * $Revision: 1.2 $
00008  * $Date: 2004/09/22 08:29:14 $
00009  *--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00010 
00011 #include "korebot.h"
00012 
00013 static int kb_init_done = 0;
00014 
00015 struct option opts[] = {
00016   { "kb-debug" ,   1 , 0 , 'd' } ,
00017   { "kb-version" , 1 , 0 , 'v' } ,
00018   { NULL      ,    0 , 0 , 0    }
00019 };
00020 
00021 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00025 int kb_init( int argc , char * argv[] )
00026 {
00027   int opt, rc;
00028 
00029   if ( kb_init_done == 0 ) {
00030 
00031     for (;;) {
00032       opt = getopt_long( argc , argv , "" , opts , NULL );
00033       if ( opt == -1 )
00034         break;
00035       
00036       switch( opt ) {
00037         /* --kb-debug <level> */
00038       case 'd':
00039         kb_set_debug_level(atoi(optarg));
00040         break;
00041 
00042         /* --kb-version */
00043       case 'v':
00044         kb_msg( "libkorebot v%u.%u [%s]" , 
00045                 KB_VERSION , KB_REVISION , __DATE__ );
00046         break;
00047 
00048       default:
00049         break;
00050       }
00051     }
00052       
00053     if ((rc = kb_config_init( argc, argv )) < 0 )
00054       return rc;
00055     
00056     if ((rc = knet_init( argc , argv )) <  0)
00057       return rc;
00058     
00059     atexit( kb_exit );
00060     
00061     kb_init_done = 1;
00062   }
00063 
00064   return 1;
00065 }
00066 
00067 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00074 void kb_exit(void)
00075 {
00076   if ( kb_init_done ) {
00077     knet_exit();
00078     kb_config_exit();
00079     kb_init_done = 0;
00080   }
00081 }
